name: Gods At War
description:
Summary

The gods are at war again, assemble your team and battle your family to assert your dominance.

Each god has unique moves based on their personality and powers.

Alpha

Can play a match with simple mechanics.

Current Features:

  • Select Any God
  • Health Amounts

Known Bugs:

  • Players Gods Don't Die Completely

Beta

Currently being reworked into more efficient game.

Controls

Left Mouse Click - Interact with buttons.

Recommended Settings

Windowed.

1280x720.

Any feedback is appreciated.

Foundation year University project.
